page.title: 16 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: 1 There is very little un-employment in Stone. People do a wide variety of jobs. Some people from the village work locally, in the hospital,school, shops, public houses and on farms. Many more work in Aylesbury in the factories and shops. Alot of the jobs are dealing with high technology but also many are working in offices. Fewer people , but still quite a number travel into London (25 miles) every day.They travel by train from Aylesbury or Princes Risborough or by car along the M40. Some people own their own small factories making a wide variety of goods.
